enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve appending content to the element, with appendElement creating a new element and append adding HTML content.
Both methods involve adding content to the element, though prepend adds it at the start instead of the end.
The html method retrieves the inner HTML of the element, which can be used to verify the content added by the append method.
The text method retrieves the combined text of the element, which can be used to verify the textual content added by the append method.
